entry.content:
Ty Bryant

tkbryant73@gmail.com 204-123-3456

Education

BSc Computer Science 4.0/4.5 GPA

Experience

Microsoft

  • Implemented interal tool that helped improve communications between staff by 57%
  • Used React to develop interactive game for homepage of Microsoft Home Page

Calabria Marketplace

  • Trained 50+ new employees in team work, line production, recipe development, and cleaning tasks.
  • Managed up to 10+ people during high intensity dinner rushes
  • Developd 3 new recipes that boosted profits by 24%

Projects

IST Application Team

  • Built an internal time request tool that allowed employees to request time off using Power Automate, SharePoint, Forms
  • Developed workflow to automate reports on expired contracts for project manager

Calabria Pizza App

  • Developed an IOS food service app that allows users to order food from Calabri Marketplace
  • Boosted profits by 78%
  • Keeps track of inventory, scheduling, food orders, internal files

Skills

Tools: node.js, React, Springboot, Angular

Languages: Java, Python, C++, C, JavaScript
